title: Remove uploaded download.webp image from the website

requirements.text: Remove the uploaded image file "download.webp" from the BM ENTERPRISES website so it is no longer displayed anywhere, including any page sections, galleries, or featured images.

quotes: remove this types of images from the websites

acceptanceCriteria: No UI page renders or references "download.webp".
If "download.webp" was included in any images array (e.g., gallery grids), it is removed from that list.
There are no broken image links caused by the removal.

requirements.text: Remove the static asset file for "download.webp" from the frontend public/static assets (only if it exists and is not referenced anywhere after REQ-35), so it is not shipped with the site build.

quotes: remove this types of images from the websites

acceptanceCriteria: The built site does not include the "download.webp" asset file.
The site builds successfully with no missing-asset errors.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not remove other images unless they are the specific "download.webp" file.
No backend/canister changes are required for this request.
